percentile.translation[0].definitions[0]: one of 100 equal-sized parts that a group of people can be divided into – used especially when comparing people’s scores in a test or levels of health
percentile.translation[1].definitions[0]: one hundredth of a set of things or people, arranged in order on a scale
Our employees’ pay is at the 90th percentile of that offered by similar companies  (=it is higher than the pay offered by 90% of similar companies).
